statements: DELETE FROM policy_expirations WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01' AND reminder_sent = false

DELETE FROM reminder WHERE reminder_id = 5 AND policy_id = 2;
DELETE FROM homeowners WHERE name = 'John Doe'
